name: Windows Escalate Get System via Administrator
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
description:
This module uses the builtin 'getsystem' command to escalate
        the current session to the SYSTEM account from an administrator
        user account.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: TECHNIQUE
options.description: Specify a particular technique to use (1-4), otherwise try them all
